Articles.Content:
Hi to all modding gods out here!

First - I love the work, you guys are doing here! Great to see, how your work brings this game to such a high level!

Second: For my gameplay, I would like to have some Kerbals working as Ground Support Crew. I already found some mods, for changing the spacesuits and let the Kerbalnauts take the helmet off - but are there any mods, that will give the Kerbals just some kind of "Jumpsuit"-like clothings? I think about something like the guys, that helped the Shuttle Crew while boarding...

Is there anything like this available?

Greetings

Horman

I would send a message or post something under one of the people that designed the custom suits. See if they can make a texture for a jumpsuit. I think it would be cool for Iva and kerbin atmosphere evas
I support this! If I wasn't so horrible at editing, I would attempt to do something like this!

On 2014/10/15 at 4:26 AM, weeble said:

I would send a message or post something under one of the people that designed the custom suits. See if they can make a texture for a jumpsuit. I think it would be cool for Iva and kerbin atmosphere evas

Support, thats good idea!!

On 08.10.2014 at 6:28 PM, Horman said:

Second: For my gameplay, I would like to have some Kerbals working as Ground Support Crew. I already found some mods, for changing the spacesuits and let the Kerbalnauts take the helmet off - but are there any mods, that will give the Kerbals just some kind of "Jumpsuit"-like clothings? I think about something like the guys, that helped the Shuttle Crew while boarding...

Is there anything like this available?

 

There is a steampunk kerbal suits mod that has them available in different colors. It was on KerbalStuff, so try to search time to time, may be it'll be uploaded somewhere else.

How do you suppose a jumpsuit should look like? Should it have not only textures but also spacesuit parts removed? Then this will require kerbal's mesh editing, IMHO
